title: Love behind bars: Women who marry convicted killers
itunes:title: Love behind bars: Women who marry convicted killers
description:
People find love in strange places, but falling for a convicted killer serving a life prison sentence is perhaps the strangest. Nancy Grace looks at Jodi Arias's prison romances and the marriages of Charles Manson, the Menendez brothers and other killers. She is joined by forensics expert Karen Smith, New York psychologist Caryn Stark and RadarOnline.com reporter Alexis Tereszcuk

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
